TopicTitle: XF-DODO: The Ugliest SSTO in the fleet.

Articles.Content:
Some of us in the KSP remember a time when things weren't so sleek and well designed. When design was based on necessity, not the whims of congressman, or the paranoia of safety committees. The XF-Dodo comes from that time, originally a experimental cruise missile, designed to carry two warheads just in case one is a dud. It was later adapted as a trainer ssto.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft here: http://d.pr/f/OZqU

Flight tips in imgur album.
interesting SSTO, but, it looks very capable never the less!

Ugly? Are you out of your mind? This is beautiful! It's possible that it'll be mauled by FAR but otherwise it's an amazing concept. And I pity the poor kerbal who is stuck in the pilot seat till the end of time.
I was going for "If Christopher Nolan's Batman had an SSTO."
Something about the asymmetry makes it awesome...
This.... IS EPIC. Dude, I am subscribing and +repping because I have never seen this design pulled off before.
excellent design! loving the use of the Mk1 lander cans
